## R Markdown

Use the package I created
```{r, echo=False, include=False}
library(mypackage)
```

Set seeds and add data to x and y:

```{r}
set.seed(21)
x = rnorm(30, 5, 2)
set.seed(23)
y = rnorm(40, 3, 2)
alpha = 0.05
length(x) = length(y)
```

## Call my constructor function

Call my constuctor function
```{r}
obj <-mypackage::myconstr(x=x,y=y,alpha = 0.05)
```

## Print

Print results
```{r}
print(obj)
```
